description.value:
Trigger You are hit by a physical melee attack by an attacker you can see that's in reach.

Requirements You're in Reflective Ripple Stance.

After the triggering attack is done, Step. You must end this Step within the attacker's reach. Then, you can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Disarm]{Disarm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} the attacker.
